Label.en: Around 900 years ago, me and a bunch of other monks from Yorkshire got kicked out of our abbey
Label.fr: Around 900 years ago, me and a bunch of other monks from Yorkshire got kicked out of our abbey
Label.es: Around 900 years ago, me and a bunch of other monks from Yorkshire got kicked out of our abbey

Label.en: Our friend Thurstan, the Archbishop of York at the time, gave us some land to build a new one
Label.fr: Our friend Thurstan, the Archbishop of York at the time, gave us some land to build a new one
Label.es: Our friend Thurstan, the Archbishop of York at the time, gave us some land to build a new one

Label.en: Of course, for many years... here's me building the second abbey!
Label.fr: Of course, for many years... here's me building the second abbey!
Label.es: Of course, for many years... here's me building the second abbey!

Label.en: Well, we made a new one! Here's me building it
Label.fr: Well, we made a new one! Here's me building it
Label.es: Well, we made a new one! Here's me building it
